# pinnacle_snowflake

pinnacle snowflake is a vector search plugin for pinnacle that allows you to performce vector search directly on snowflake tables.

## Installation

```bash
pip install pinnacle_snowflake
```

## API


- [Code](https://github.com/pinnacle-io/pinnacle/tree/main/plugins/snowflake)
- [API-docs](/docs/api/plugins/pinnacle_snowflake)

| Class | Description |
|---|---|
| `pinnacle_snowflake.vector_search.SnowflakeVectorSearch` | SnowflakeVectorSearch class for performing vector search. |
